1.1.0.name: wordpress/bxslider-integration
1.1.0.description:
bxSlider for WordPress integrates the cool responsive content slider bxSlider jQuery plugin in your very own WordPress site. Galleries are turned into beautiful sliders, but you can also roll you own sliders using special shortcode. The best thing is that you are not limited to the number of sliders or galleries per page, you can have as many as you want!

Why should you use this slider? I'll quote the bxSlider's website:

  • Fully responsive - will adapt to any device
  • Horizontal, vertical, and fade modes
  • Slides can contain images, video, or HTML content
  • Advanced touch / swipe support built-in
  • Uses CSS transitions for slide animation (native hardware acceleration!)
  • Full callback API and public methods
  • Small file size, fully themed, simple to implement
  • Browser support: Firefox, Chrome, Safari, iOS, Android, IE7+

If you like our plugins, you might want t
